```{r}

#install.packages(c("performance", "see"))
library("performance")
data("mtcars")

chisq.test( table(mtcars$vs, mtcars$am))

#correlation
cor.test(mtcars$hp, mtcars$drat)
#t.test
t.test(mtcars$wt[mtcars$vs==0], mtcars$wt[mtcars$vs==1])
t.test(wt~vs, data=mtcars)

#linear regression

lm(wt~vs, data=mtcars)
res <- lm(wt~vs+am, data=mtcars)
summary(res)
check_model(res)

#logistic regression
res2 <- glm(am ~ hp + wt, data=mtcars,family = binomial(link = "logit"))
summary(res2)
check_model(res2)


```
